name: School Nerd: The Haunted Mansion
description:
School Nerd in Haunted House is a Plataformer Horror Themed Game Made for halloween / pixel horror game jam

You was challenged by his friends to spend a night in this haunted mansion .. They Prove that you are not the biggest school asshole! Keep Alive this Adventure Freaky !

*some bug fixes!

Controls:

Arrows- Move

Z - Jump

X- Atack

UP+X = Special Weapon
